about:
## About Live Stream Recorder

Your live streams are content gold — don't let them disappear. Our cloud-based platform automatically saves your broadcasts so you can repurpose them into clips, highlights, and short-form content.

### Automatic Livestream Recording

Connect your streaming channels and we handle the rest. Stream recording happens automatically in the background — no software to install, no manual scheduling. Go live and your streams are captured and saved to the cloud.

### Turn Streams Into Clips

Your 3-hour stream has dozens of viral moments. Our tools help you find and clip the highlights that perform best on TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Instagram Reels. Stream once, post everywhere.

### Watch & Download Anytime

All your recorded streams are saved securely on our servers. Access your recordings through our built-in player, download them for editing, or share directly to social platforms.

### Record TikTok, Twitch, YouTube & More

Whether you stream on TikTok, Twitch, YouTube, Kick, AfreecaTV, or Pandalive — our cloud-based service has you covered. Record across multiple platforms, all organized in one place.

### No Screen Recorder Needed

Unlike a live stream screen recorder that requires your computer to stay on, our cloud service runs 24/7. No livestream screen recorder software needed. Your streams are recorded even if you forget.

### Free to Get Started

Create an account and connect your channels today. Upgrade to premium for higher quality recordings, unlimited storage, and advanced clipping tools.
